page.title: 16TRANSPORT
page.content: {TRANSPORT Out of 35 people who had{cars}80% said they used their{ car}alot.6% said they used their{cars}for special ocassions.11% said they used their {cars}for work and 6% said they never used their{cars}very often.15% said they never had{cars.}More people have {cars}than people who don't. Out of 41 people who were interveiwed 71% said they liked the{bus service}very much.5% said they didn't like the{bus service but used it.29% said they didn't like the{bus service}and never used it. Lots of people have{cars}probably because if they didn't they wouldn't be able to get to carlisle or other places when ever they wanted to,and most people don't use the{bus service because they have{cars.
